title: LeagueClient.exe broken image
body:
C:/Riot Games/league pf legends/BugSplat.dll isn't appointed on windows to run
How do i fix it?

replies.body: It kind of sounds like Windows might not be allowing that DLL to work the way it's supposed to. Let's first try updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure that those files can work the way they're intended, but if that doesn't seem to help hit me back and we can dig a little further!
